features: 21% Higher Conversion Efficiency:The solar panel for Ring doorbell battery powered made of monocrystalline silicon,charging efficiency up to 21% higher than others.It can help your doorbell charged quickly.

365Days No-stop Supply: Our solar panel for ring doorbell could continuously absorb sunshine to charge your doorbell.Do not need frequently uninstall and charge the doorbell manually again. Doorbell solar panel charger for Ring have 3M/9.8FT Charging Cable,it is allow you install the solar panels in a place full of sunshine.

Compatible with Battery Powered for Ring Doorbell:This solar panel for ring doorbell battery charger compatible with ring video doorbell 2,video doorbell 3/3+ &video doorbell 4. Do not compatible with doorbell Wire,video doorbell Pro.

IP65 Waterproof & 10pcs Cable Clips:The doorbell solar panel charger for ring is IP65 waterproof withstand rain,snow and thunderstorm,operating temperature range is -5°F to 120°F. the package included 10pcs cable clip,the line of the doorbell solar panel can be fixed on the wall,make the doorbell and solar charger looks beautiful and tidy.

360°Adjustable Bracket & Easy installation:Solar panel for ring doorbell have 360°adjustable bracket,allow you adjust the doorbell solar charger to the place where have enough sunshine.You could only Punch two holes in the wall,then install the base and plug the doorbell solar panel.Fix the charge cable with cable clips.
body.description: Why Choose us? a.5W battery powered for ring doorbell make charging more faster. b.Solar panel for ring doorbell help you saves electricity and money. c.Our solar panel for ring doorbell solar charger included 10pcs cable clips,fix the charge cable of solar panel on the wall.Make your walls look beautiful and tidy. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with Ring doorbell 3, excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: This solar panel works with my Ring Doorbell 3. There was a minor issue with the wiring but it still charged my ring device. I did notify customer service in case I have issues in the future and they got back to me immediately and made sure I was a happy customer. This is a company who stands behind their products and I am happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this set up. Panel in full sun (I live in Tucson. We have lots of sun). Gradual decline in charging, even in full sun. Completely quit working in 6 months, no way to contact company for support. Unbelievable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this based off other customers' reviews and they did not disappoint!I followed the instructions provided and double-checked an installation guide via YouTube to ensure I connected it to my Ring Video Doorbell 2 correctly. I positioned the panel where the sun hits directly but had to wait overnight to actually see the status updated on my Ring app that a solar device was connected and charging my Doorbell. This was because I installed it in the evening when the sun was nearly setting.This solar panel works if you install it the right way. I am very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Charging my Ring!
reviews.reviewText: This solar charging is working with my Ring Doorbell camera. I haven't had to pull the Ring battery out to recharge it since installing the panel. It keeps my batteries at a steady 90% plus charge.The only drawbacks are: it that when I check the Ring doorbells health, it sometimes doesn't recognize the solar charger is connected. But it still keeps it charged. Plus, the solar panel and Ring camera do not mark the connections as + or -. If it doesn't work, switch connections. Yoiu'll need your phone to check your device health to monitor the charging.I used the AlertCam 2-in-1 gutter mount as they both use the bolt threads: female in the solar panel and male for the mount. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BQXXCKDG?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I connected the solar panel to my ring video doorbell. I connected it and it was quite tricky because the wire is a little bulky. It's receiving sunlight as you can see, however it doesn't charge my ring. It is actually estrange because as you can see, it says hardwired instead of solar. I'll keep it connected for a few days and provide an update if needed.11/23 update: the solar panel didn’t work at all! Didn’t maintain the charge worst charge the battery. The panel has been expose to direct sunlight the whole time. Would recommend. I started a refund claim.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tough To Wire Correctly
reviews.reviewText: I have a Ring Video Doorbell 1 and can’t figure out how to get this to charge. I e tried connecting the Forks in 2 different ways and it doesn’t seem to want to charge even though my multimeter is showing that the solar panel is drawing power.From the panel, is the red wire positive or negative? How about the white wire?On a v1 doorbell, is the left screw positive or negative?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I needed this for my camper doorbell since I live in Florida this worked out great
